title: sakrecoer
author: sakrecoer
content: To keep giving the users more tools to secure their ALPH, Alephium has implemented the BIP39 passphrase feature in the desktop wallet v1.3.0Read about it in the dedicated blogpostWhile this article is specifically crafted for the Alephium use case, it can be useful for anyone trying to better understand the implications and advantages of BIP39.Happy reading!
